Name: DayDream Mosaics
About the game: Escape into the fantasy world of Daydream Mosaics and build your own sanctuaries of peace and relaxation. Solve logic based nonograms to earn the crystals needed for building your sanctuaries. Wonderful wallpapers will unlock along the way. - Logic based mosaics with up to 6 colors. Each level has its unique color set. - Over 100 nongram levels. - 3 tranquil sanctuaries to build. - Unlock 10 stunning wallpapers. - Choose between 3 game modes: relaxed, normal and advanced. - A wide array of customization options, including 6 tile skins and the option to display only the active color. - Level progress is saved at all times so you can get quickly in and out of the game. - Relaxing soundtrack.
